title:
BOARD BILL #186
An ordinance approving the petition to establish the Forsyth Associates Community Improvement District

abstracts.abstract: BOARD BILL #186					Introduced by Ald. Marlene Davis An ordinance approving the petition to establish the Forsyth Associates Community Improvement District, establishing the Forsyth Associates Community Improvement District, confirming the prior determination that the Forsyth Associates Community Improvement District is a blighted area, finding a public purpose for the establishment of the Forsyth Associates Community Improvement District, and containing a severability clause.
